info.name: Zooys Modules - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for all Zooys modules: Diagram, Math, Presentation, Summarize, PDF Operations, and Flashcards

body.raw:
{
  "input": "Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy. It occurs in chloroplasts and requires sunlight, water, and carbon dioxide. The end products are glucose and oxygen.",
  "input_type": "text",
  "count": 5,
  "difficulty": "intermediate",
  "style": "mixed"
}
